data.name: TCP/MLLP Input
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    {{#if (eq protocol "mllp")}}
    <from uri="{{protocol}}://{{hostname}}:{{port}}{{path}}{{querystring mllp_query_params extra_query_params}}"/>
    {{/if}}
    {{#if (eq protocol "netty:tcp")}}
    <from uri="{{protocol}}://{{hostname}}:{{port}}{{path}}{{querystring netty_query_params extra_query_params}}"/>
    {{/if}}
        {{applyUnmarshal out_format}}    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
